function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of distinction between research and development may hinder effective organization of disease mitigation efforts.","Impact":"Difficulty in prioritizing and allocating resources for disease research and development.","Mitigation":"Establish clear criteria for distinguishing research and development activities in the context of disease mitigation.","Technologies":"Documentation and categorization tools for research and development activities.","People":"Researchers, public health officials, and policymakers.","Owner":"Public health organizations and government bodies."},{"Description":"Inadequate emphasis on interdisciplinary collaboration may result in limited progress in disease mitigation strategies.","Impact":"Missed opportunities for combining expertise from different fields to address complex disease challenges.","Mitigation":"Promote interdisciplinary training and collaboration to foster innovative and comprehensive disease mitigation approaches.","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, interdisciplinary training programs, and communication tools.","People":"Physicians, scientists, engineers, and allied professionals in various disciplines.","Owner":"Educational institutions, research organizations, and industry stakeholders."}]}
